snippet: A senior American intelligence official on Saturday warned that the Syrian conflict could last “many, many months to multiple years.”
abstract: Defense Intelligence Agency deputy director David R Shedd warns that war in Syria could last for years and says situation will most likely worsen, regardless of whether Pres Bashar al-Assad remains in power; implies that United States and its allies should do more to confront country's radical Islamist elements.

byline.original: By ERIC SCHMITT and MARK MAZZETTI

lead_paragraph: A senior American intelligence official on Saturday warned that the Syrian conflict could last “many, many months to multiple years.”

headline.main: U.S. Intelligence Official Says Syrian War Could Last for Years
headline.print_headline: U.S. Intelligence Official Says Syrian War Could Last for Years

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
